resources.string: Delete the HTML file (Can\'t be undone!)
The file selected is not a TiddlyWiki
Are you sure you want to remove this Wiki from Tiddloid?
The item selected is not a TiddlyWiki. Do you want to remove it?
Are you sure you want to replace this Wiki with the backup version? This operation cannot be undone!
Unsaved changes detected. Are you sure you want to quit?
Are you sure you want to quit? Please make sure all your modifications have been saved.
The page is trying to start another application. Do you want to continue?

Tiddloid is an app to work with locally stored TiddlyWikis. Once have some ideas, you can immediately write them down so that you can access them anywhere. For more details of TiddlyWiki, please see https://tiddlywiki.com/ .
